name: Google Calendar Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for Google Calendar subagent capabilities including event management, calendar operations, free/busy queries, and scheduling. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items.

items.input: create meeting tomorrow at 2pm called Team Standup
items.expected_output: Create event with summary 'Team Standup' and start_datetime set to tomorrow 2pm.

items.input: show my calendar events for today
items.expected_output: List events for today with timeMin and timeMax set to today.

items.input: what's on my calendar this week
items.expected_output: List events with date range for current week.

items.input: schedule meeting with john@example.com for friday at 10am
items.expected_output: Create event with attendee john@example.com for Friday 10am.

items.input: find the meeting about budget review
items.expected_output: Find event using query 'budget review'.

items.input: reschedule the standup to 3pm
items.expected_output: 1. Find event 'standup'. 2. Patch event with new start time.
items.context: User wants to update event time

items.input: create event 'Client Call' for 1 hour 30 minutes
items.expected_output: Create event with event_duration_hour=1 and event_duration_minutes=30.

items.input: delete the cancelled meeting
items.expected_output: 1. Find cancelled meeting. 2. Request confirmation. 3. Delete event.
items.context: User wants to delete - needs consent

items.input: check when I'm free tomorrow
items.expected_output: Query free/busy or find free slots for tomorrow.

items.input: when am I available for a meeting this week
items.expected_output: Find free slots for current week.

items.input: list my calendars
items.expected_output: List all calendars in user's calendar list.

items.input: create calendar called 'Personal Projects'
items.expected_output: Create new calendar with summary 'Personal Projects'.

items.input: add sarah@company.com to the team meeting
items.expected_output: 1. Find team meeting event. 2. Patch event to add attendee.

items.input: remove john from the project kickoff event
items.expected_output: 1. Find project kickoff event. 2. Remove attendee john.

items.input: quick add lunch with boss tomorrow noon
items.expected_output: Quick add event with natural language text.

items.input: update meeting description to include agenda
items.expected_output: 1. Find meeting. 2. Patch event with updated description.

items.input: get calender events
items.expected_output: 1. Recognize 'calender' as typo for 'calendar'. 2. List calendar events.

items.input: move sprint planning to Work calendar
items.expected_output: 1. Find sprint planning event. 2. Move event to Work calendar.
items.context: User wants to move event between calendars

items.input: what time is it in my timezone
items.expected_output: Get current date and time for user's timezone.

items.input: show all instances of weekly standup
items.expected_output: 1. Find weekly standup event. 2. Get event instances.

items.input: delete my secondary calendar
items.expected_output: 1. List calendars. 2. Find secondary calendar. 3. Request confirmation. 4. Delete calendar.
items.context: User wants to delete calendar - needs consent

items.input: get my calendar settings
items.expected_output: List user settings for calendar.

items.input: update Work calendar description
items.expected_output: 1. Find Work calendar. 2. Patch calendar with new description.

items.input: create all-day event for company holiday on Dec 25
items.expected_output: Create event with all-day format for December 25.

items.input: find meetings with john next week
items.expected_output: Find events with query 'john' and date range for next week.
